attributes.action: Act quickly and decisively to stem the vicious flow of anti-L.G.B.T. violence that has already caused so many deaths in Iraq since our govenment joined the Americans in their invasion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the British Government were instrumantal in the invasion of Iraq, we the undersigned, believe that it is your (the British Govt's) obligation to help prevent further deaths and human rights abuses being perpertrated against Lesbians, bisexuals, gay men and transgendered people who are living in present day Iraq. These sorts of human rights abuses are stated (by Iraqi L.G.B.T's and human rights activists)as being more common since the current U.S./U.K. invasion. When will this important issue be raised in parliament?
